function.name: channel_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the channel of a TV device.

location.description: The location where the device for which channel needs to be increased is located.

room.description: The room where the air conditioner is located. e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

device.description: The name or type of the device on which the channel needs to be increased.

channel.description: The amount by which the channel needs to be increased for the device.
